channel.title: The new warn system
channel.description:
Man, these dots look ugly. I'd be content with using smileys.
Banned from the forums: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnban.gif[/img] Suggested smiley replacement: :mad: Muted, not allowed to post: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] Suggested smiley replacement: :| Warned by a pmod, w/e: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnpmod.gif[/img] Suggested smiley replacement: :o Warned by a mod/admin: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Suggested smiley replacement: :eek:
I'd also like to see the [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/Female.gif[/img] and [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/Male.gif[/img] signs go into action next to the names.
Here's an example of it in action:
[img]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/4575/thewarnsystemep7.png[/img] [hr]
The new one is on the bottom, the old on the top. I could also make some new dots which didn't look so out of place, but this seemed more interesting.
Vote yes if: You don't like the current warn dots or you like the idea of using smileys and the gender signs better. Vote no if: You don't like this idea.

item.title: The new warn system
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

And of course, the only permissible verification for females would be a boob shot with their usernames prominently featured in Sharpie.

Read full topic

item.title: The new warn system
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Of course there would have to be a verification system for sex symbols. If you choose male, no verification is required. If you choose female, you must upload a picture or have an admin manually verify.

Read full topic

item.title: The new warn system
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“blacker, post:24, topic:40169”][quote author=Aftermath_96 link=topic=56288.msg699366#msg699366 date=1167345246]

[offtopic] Aftermath, I didn’t even know we could make our sigs that big… did mopar raise the sig size?[/offtopic]

[ontopic] The current warning/ banned/ muted symbols heart my eyes… every time I look at a warning symbol, my eyes bleed…[/ontopic]

Yes, they make my eyes bleed
I just made my sig that big as an experiment to see the maximum size we could use. The current setting is 96, but I should probably change it back.
[/quote] Hey, Pwnd unwarned you :)[/quote]
lol he can do that?

Read full topic
